TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewButtonColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

summary.span: 承载一个 对象集合。

span.span: Hosts a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是种特殊的类型的类用来以逻辑方式承载该响应简单的用户输入的单元。The class is a specialized type of the class used to logically host cells that respond to simple user input. 一个都有一个关联中每个的相交。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 每个单元格都提供类似于一个用户界面 (UI)控件。Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a control. 若要显示每个单元格的同一按钮文本，请设置属性设置为`true`并设置属性设置为所需的按钮文本。To display the same button text for every cell, set the property to `true` and set the property to the desired button text. 此列类型的默认排序模式是。The default sort mode for this column type is . 若要响应用户单击按钮，处理或事件。To respond to user button clicks, handle the or event. 在事件处理程序，可以使用属性来确定是否单击了按钮列中。In the event handler, you can use the property to determine whether the click occurred in the button column. 可以使用属性来确定单击发生在按钮单元格而不是在列标题。You can use the property to determine whether the click occurred in a button cell and not on the column header. > [!NOTE] > 当启用了可视样式时，使用绘制按钮列中的按钮，和单元格样式指定通过属性如不起作用。When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a , and cell styles specified through properties such as have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对特定的行执行操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to perform actions on particular rows. 在此示例中，事件处理程序将首先确定是否单击在按钮单元格，然后检索与行关联的业务对象。In this example, a event handler first determines whether a click is on a button cell, then retrieves a business object associated with the row. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 访问 Windows 窗体 DataGridViewComboBoxCell 下拉列表中的对象](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Access Objects in a Windows Forms DataGridViewComboBoxCell Drop-Down List](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/vb/form1.vb#100)]

para.span: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 此外应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

related.span: 如何：禁用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的按钮列中的按钮

summary.span: 获取或设置用于创建新单元格的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

value.span: 一个 ，列中的所有其他单元格都以它为模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数类初始化此属性设置为新创建。The constructor for the class initializes this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响列的现有单元格的用户界面 (UI)。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 这些更改只会明显后重新生成列 (例如，通过对列进行排序或通过调用方法)。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用若要查看某位员工已的销售额。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to view the sales an employee has made. 单元格模板用于将相同的颜色应用于所有按钮。A cell template is used to apply the same color to all buttons. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#10)]

para.span: 重写时派生类中调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保也将复制的派生类中添加的任何属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

summary.span: 获取或设置列的默认单元格样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
The to be applied as the default style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值返回此属性具有一个初始属性值为。The default returned by this property has an initial property value of . 此值将替代中指定的值属性的控件，但可能会覆盖由其他单元格样式属性。This value overrides the value specified in the property of the control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 当启用了可视样式时，使用绘制按钮列中的按钮和单元格样式指定通过属性如不起作用。When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a and cell styles specified through properties such as have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/CS/changecolumnalignment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/VB/changecolumnalignment.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置列中按钮单元格的平面样式外观。

span.span: Gets or sets the flat-style appearance of the button cells in the column.

value.span: 一个 值，指示列中按钮的外观。

span.span: A value indicating the appearance of the buttons in the column.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定列中单元格的外观。The property specifies the appearance of the cells in the column. 有关详细信息，请参见 枚举。For more information, see the enumeration. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用若要查看某位员工已的销售额。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to view the sales an employee has made. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在按钮单元格上的默认文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the default text displayed on the button cell.
A that contains the text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个具有与列中所含属性值为`true`显示单元格的按钮的属性值。Each contained in the column that has as a property value of `true` displays the property value on the cell's button. 如果没有关联控件，更改此属性刷新列显示。If there is an associated control, changing this property refreshes the column display. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用若要查看某位员工已的销售额。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to view the sales an employee has made. 属性用于设置列标题。The property is used to set the column header. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示 属性值是否显示为此列中单元格的按钮文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property value is displayed as the button text for cells in this column.

value.span: 如果 属性值显示在列中的按钮上，则为 ；如果每个单元格的 属性值都显示在它的按钮上，则为 。

span.span: if the property value is displayed on buttons in the column; if the property value of each cell is displayed on its button.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，按钮的单元格是否显示为按钮文本。By default, the of a button cell is displayed as the text on the button. 属性可以是将设置每个单元格的按钮文本，或者可以使用按钮单元格的所有属性值。The property allows you to either set the button text for each cell, or to use the property value for all of the button cells. 获取或设置此属性获取或设置属性返回的对象属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还将设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#010)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#010](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#010)]

span.span: The value of the property is .
